audiobook.description:
Author(s): Brigid Lowry Narrator(s): Vanessa Rhodes A beautifully presented and uplifting book of contemplative, wry, sometimes funny essays about living thoughtfully and with care amidst life’s challenges.

'Infused with honesty and insight and brimming with compassion, this wise book is a nourishing companion for troubled times. A must-read for cultivating a tender and loving approach to ourselves, others and our world'. —Sally Gillespie, author of Climate Crisis and Consciousness


If you’re struggling to maintain grace and good humour amidst daily potholes and pitfalls, Brigid Lowry may be just the warm, wise, and witty companion you need.

Informed by contemporary psychology and Zen Buddhism, Brigid’s essays offer reflections on everything from friendship to grief, and from gratitude to self-care.

A Year of Loving Kindness to Myself is all the encouragement you’ll need to nurture you and those around you.

audiobook.name: A Year of Loving Kindness to Myself: & Other Essays
